title.rendered: Options for Longer Lashes: Where Do Eyelash Extensions Rank?

content.rendered:
If you’ve always dreamed of having longer, thicker eyelashes, you’re not alone. Most women have felt that desire at one time or another. After all, long lashes can be vital for framing your eyes and drawing attention to one of your most beautiful assets. Unfortunately, most of us aren’t born with perfect eyelashes, which is why mascara and other eye makeup products exist. Still, makeup isn’t the only option for dealing with short, uninspiring lashes. In this article, we’ll examine some celebrated solutions to this lash problem, including eyelash extensions.

Castor Oil

Proponents of castor oil suggest that it can help to stimulate lash growth. There’s been no evidence to support this, however. At best, castor oil can be a useful tool for helping to make your lashes softer – something that might be beneficial for women whose lashes tend to be dry and brittle. If you’re looking for added growth, look elsewhere.

Eyelash Growth Serum

There are products on the market that can help to stimulate lash growth. These serums are somewhat pricey, but they will help many women to obtain longer lashes over time. There is a drawback, of course. Once you start using the serum, you need to continue usage to maintain that length. The results are only temporary. More importantly, though, these serums are not always effective.

Falsies

False eyelashes are a well-known tool that many women use to give themselves longer lashes. Typically, women who wear falsies do so for special occasions – like a wedding, or other social gathering. This option provides longer, fuller lashes at a cost-effective price. You put them on when you need them, and take them off with ease. Unfortunately, most don’t look natural, and that kind of defeats the purpose. Still, if you’re just looking for a temporary solution and don’t mind everyone knowing that you’re wearing fake lashes, this can be the perfect way to achieve that goal.

Lash Extensions

Lash extensions are an increasingly popular option for women who want to transform their lashes and get the glamorous look they’ve always dreamed of enjoying. Each extension is glued to a separate lash, providing added length and thickness – and just the right amount of natural curl. A full set of extensions takes about an hour to apply, and you can schedule recurring appointments for refills to maintain your set for many months.

Because of those benefits – and the great look you’ll enjoy with your new, dazzling eyelashes, extensions rank at the top of any list of lash-lengthening options. The only caveat is that you need to ensure that your extensions are applied by trained and licensed professionals who are committed to providing the best lash applications in the area.

At Ebenezer Eyelash, our fully-licensed lash technicians will ensure that your lashes always look and feel their best. If you’ve weighed your lash-lengthening options and decided that extensions are right for you, give us a call today to schedule your appointment to get the best eyelash extensions in New York City.
